mods.name: MorePrecisePlayerHeight
mods.details:
Original mod made by Eris for PC (Ported by Rugtveit)

A very small Beat Saber mod that's let you view your own height with higher precision... at least one more decimal.

Config:
    - enabled (true | false) - Enables the mod
    - measureInFeet (true | false ) - Changes from meter to Feet.
creator: Rugtveit

mods.name: QuestSounds
mods.details:
QuestSounds allows the user to change sounds without asset mods, 
just drop them into default path or your custom path!

Features:
  Support for OGG, MP3 and WAV file formats!
  Creates sounds folder at /sdcard/Android/data/com.beatgames.beatsaber/files/ 
  AFTER YOU HAVE RAN THE MOD ONCE
  Config for disabling and enabling Custom Sounds!
  Custom filepaths in config, so you can decide where you want the sounds!

Sounds you can change and default path:
  HitSound:         sdcard/Android/data/com.beatgames.beatsaber/files/sounds/HitSound.ogg
  BadHitSound: sdcard/Android/data/com.beatgames.beatsaber/files/sounds/BadHitSound.ogg
  MenuMusic:    sdcard/Android/data/com.beatgames.beatsaber/files/sounds/MenuMusic.ogg
  MenuClick:       sdcard/Android/data/com.beatgames.beatsaber/files/sounds/MenuClick.ogg
  Firework:          sdcard/Android/data/com.beatgames.beatsaber/files/sounds/Firework.ogg
  LevelCleared:    sdcard/Android/data/com.beatgames.beatsaber/files/sounds/LevelCleared.ogg
creator: Rugtveit

mods.name: GoodbyeBug
mods.details:
ONLY WORKS ON 1.12.2
 Fixed bugs:
    - Scrolling bug that prevents seeing more than 8 playlists.
    - Practice speed bug that made it impossible to do 100%

Changelog:
   - Updated beatsaber-hook version to support compatibility with newer mods!
creator: Rugtveit

mods.name: RumbleRumbleQuest
mods.details: RumbleRumbleQuest allows you to adjust controller haptics "rumbles" in-game. RumbleRumbleQuest is a Quest port of the popular RumbleMod.
creator: marcuszhou

mods.name: ParticleTuner
mods.details:
Partially ported ParticleOverdrive to the Quest. ParticleTuner allows you to adjust the number of particles spawned after slicing a note. There's also a rainbow mode for randomizing particle colors :)

The mod doesn't do anything out of the box. To configure ParticleTuner, go to Settings > Mod Settings > ParticleTuner
creator: marcuszhou

mods.name: Better Menu
mods.details:
A mod that rearranges the main menu into a more organized grid layout.
This is a port of the original mod created by AceofShovels
creator: StackDoubleFlow

mods.name: Score Percentage
mods.details:
Now with Settings UI! wait does pc even have that????

creator: FutureMapper

mods.name: QuestTrailOverlap
mods.details: Makes the saber trails overlap instead of cut into eachother
creator: RedBrumbler
